### IPromptPlusConfig.SliderWidth property
</br>


#### Gets Sets the width of the Slider bar.Default value is 40. Valid range is 10–255; values outside the range are coerced to the nearest boundary.

```csharp
public byte SliderWidth { get; set; }
```
